blogs.title: Impact metrics for researchers | The Research Whisperer
blogs.summary: Source: https://theresearchwhisperer.wordpress.com/2014/10/14/impact-metrics-for-researchers/ How to make a simple research budgetPlaying with altmetrics →Impact metrics for researchers      14 October 2014by researchwhisper1 CommentSt

author.name: Research Tools
author.description: In order to improve the quality of systematic researches, various tools have been developed by well-known scientific institutes sporadically. Dr. Nader Ale Ebrahim has collected these sporadic tools under one roof in a collection named “Research Tool Box”. The toolbox contains over 720 tools so far, classified in 4 main categories: Literature-review, Writing a paper, Targeting suitable journals, as well as Enhancing visibility and impact factor.

blogs.title: Impact metrics for researchers
blogs.summary:
Stacy Konkiel is the Director of Marketing & Research at Impactstory, a not-for-profit service that tracks altmetrics. 
A former academic librarian, Stacy has written and spoken most often about the potential for altmetrics in academic libraries.
Stacy
